titles.title: 202 Lord Jesus When We Think of Thee

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
D
verse 1
Lord Jesus when
We think of Thee
Of all Thy love and grace
Our spirits long
And fain would see
Thy beauty face to face

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And though the wilderness we tread
A barren thirsty ground
With thorns and briars overspread
Where foes and snares abound

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Yet in Thy love
Such depths we see
Our hearts
O'erflow with praise
Content ourselves
While Lord to Thee
A joyful song we raise

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Our Lord our Life
Our Rest our Shield
Our Rock our Food our Light
Each thought of Thee doth constant yield
Unchanging fresh delight

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Blest Savior keep
Our spirits stayed
Hard following after Thee
Till we in robes
Of white arrayed
Thy face in glory see
